title: How to Play Jubilee

steps.headline: Deal each player eight cards.
steps.description: Place the remainder of the pack face down in the middle of the table. This becomes the stock.

steps.headline: Start.
steps.description: The person to the dealer's left begins the game. Each player in turn plays a card to a common waste pile. The first to play must play a black card, stating its value.

steps.headline: Each time players play cards, they must announce the total value of the cards played in the game so far.
After playing a card, a new card must be drawn from the stockpile.
steps.description: This continues until there is no more stockpile to draw from. Note! Nobody can draw down the total score to zero. If a player is not able to play, he or she must show their hand and pass.

steps.headline: Finish when there are no more cards to play.
steps.description: The final tally should amount to 189.

text: Shuffle the cards.  Deal each player eight cards. Place the remainder of the pack face down in the middle of the table. This becomes the stock. Start. The person to the dealer's left begins the game. Each player in turn plays a card to a common waste pile. The first to play must play a black card, stating its value. Each time players play cards, they must announce the total value of the cards played in the game so far.  After playing a card, a new card must be drawn from the stockpile. This continues until there is no more stockpile to draw from. Note! Nobody can draw down the total score to zero. If a player is not able to play, he or she must show their hand and pass. Finish when there are no more cards to play. The final tally should amount to 189.
